column1: Smoque BBQ////Very very good barbecue!!! the brisket is just amazing! moist
column2: crispy outside. the best part of this place is that the food is lean!!! the plate stays clean
column3: not full of oul and still the meat is tender. plus
column4: the cole slaw is perhaps the best I ever had. Ribs are good but nothing crazy. And they give you plenty of gooood fries!!!
